name: Pop Story (Lancelot Marechal)
description:
Project Save The President: a school project with a team of 2 programmers and 5 designers, with the goal of creating a 2.5D game with a core feature.

All the assets were made by Malo

STORY :

You are Pop, the hero of a pop-up book. Your life is peaceful until one day a monstrous entity threatens your world.

You have to resolve puzzles using 2D and 3D to advance to the end of the book in order to get rid of the threat.

CONTROLS : MOVE :  JUMP :Interact:Controller Left StickAXKeyboardW A S D SPACEBAR E CREATORS :
  • Lancelot MARECHAL "IanCelo"
  • Camille LAUNAY
  • Lucien PARENT-SANTARELLI
  •  Justin LEGER
  • Sofian HAQUIN
  • Malo
Made with Unity
